pr_title: FAI-234 - Better handling of vector types

timeline.message: FAI-234 - minor improvements to vector type handling

timeline.bodyText: When is it possible to obtain a vector as ByteBuffer?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: as a result of persisting vector based models (e.g. GloVe) as binaries. In this scenario each value should correspond to the bytes associated to one row.
replies.author: tteofili

timeline.bodyText: Where this format is defined? Is this intended to be a json array?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: since many vector based models are formatted as a CSV file, this should be a line of comma separated values.
replies.author: tteofili
